content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5) storing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items between entities.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -45.5) transferring items between entities.

### Coal and Iron Plate Processing Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5) storing items.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items between entities.

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the inserters have access to source items. Check if the source entities are producing items and that there is a clear path for the inserters to pick up items.

### Burners Out of Fuel
- Regularly check the fuel levels of burner mining drills and burner inserters. Make sure they are refueled to avoid interruptions in production.

### Chest Full
- Regularly empty chests to prevent mining drills from halting due to full storage. Ensure that there is a continuous flow of items from chests to processing units.

### Furnaces with No Ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have a steady supply of ingredients to process. Check the supply lines and inserters feeding into the furnaces to maintain continuous production.
